sentences: Teisel päeval seisid kõik viis inspektori ees – direktorit niisuguse pisiasja puhul veel ei segatud.
context: In Estonian, 'inspektor' refers to an official who is responsible for inspection or supervision. It can be used in various contexts such as school inspectors (kooli inspektor), traffic inspectors (liiklus inspektor), tax inspectors (maksu inspektor), etc. The word follows the Estonian declension pattern with suffixes -i, -it for different cases. In some countries, it can also refer to a deputy principal who assists with educational matters.
